snippet: The signing of Kevin Youkilis by the Yankees greatly improves the talent pool of Jewish ballplayers in New York.
abstract: New York Yankees signing of third baseman Kevin Youkilis greatly improves the talent pool of Jewish ballplayers in New York.
lead_paragraph: The signing of Kevin Youkilis by the Yankees greatly improves the talent pool of Jewish ballplayers in New York.

headline.main: For New York Fans Accustomed to Letdowns, a New Reason to Kvell
